name: Baktoid Prototype
description: While you perform a special attack, if a friendly ship with the Networked Calculations ship ability has a lock on the defender, you may ignore the [Focus], [Calculate], or [Lock] requirement of that attack.

name: DFS-311
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may transfer 1 of your calculate tokens to another friendly ship at range 0-3.

name: DGS-047
description: After you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], you may acquire a lock on it. Then, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], it gains 1 strain token.

name: Haor Chall Prototype
description: After an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 0-2 declares another friendly ship as the defender, you may perform a [Calculate] or [Lock] action.

name: Haor Chall Prototype
description: After an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] at range 0-2 declares a scenario feature or another friendly ship as the defender, you may perform a [Calculate] or [Lock] action.

name: IG-111
description: After you perform an attack that missed, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc] and gain 1 deplete token. If you do, that ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage.

name: Kelrodo-Ai Holdout
description: After you are destroyed, you may transfer each of your locks and green tokens to another friendly Kelrodo-Ai Holdout at range 0-3.

name: The Iron Assembler
description: After a friendly ship at range 0-1 skips its execute maneuver step, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, if there is an asteroid or debris cloud at range 0 of it, that ship may repair 1 damage.

name: Captain Sear
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs a primary attack, if the defender is in its [Bullseye Arc], before the Neutralize Results step, the friendly ship may spend 1 calculate token to cancel 1 [Evade] result.

name: Geonosian Prototype
description: While you perform a [Missile] or [Cannon] attack, you may remove 1 tractor token from the defender to reroll up to 2 attack dice.
After you defend, you may spend 1 calculate token to perform an action.

name: Bombardment Drone
description: If you would drop a device, you may launch that device instead, using the same template.

name: DBS-32C
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1 calculate token to perform a [Coordinate] action. You cannot coordinate ships that do not have the Networked Calculations ship ability.

name: DBS-32C
description: After you perform a [Calculate] action, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Jam] action.

name: DFS-081
description: While a friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, it may spend 1 calculate token to change all [Critical Hit] results to [Hit] results.

name: DFS-081
description: While defending, you may spend 1 [Charge] and 1 calculate token to cancel 1 [Critical Hit] result.

name: DGS-286
description: Before you engage, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1. That ship transfers 1 calculate token to you.

name: DIS-347
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may acquire a lock on an object at range 1-3 that has a friendly lock.

name: Fearsome Predator
description: Setup: After placing forces, assign the Fearful Prey condition to 1 enemy ship.

name: Onderon Oppressor
description: After you barrel roll or sideslip, if you are stressed, gain 1 calculate token.

name: Precise Hunter
description: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may reroll 1 blank result.

name: Wat Tambor
description: While you perform a primary attack, you may reroll 1 attack die for each calculating friendly ship at range 1 of the defender.

name: DBS-404
description: While you perform an attack at attack range 1, you must roll 1 additional die. After the attack hits, suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

name: DBS-404
description: While you perform an attack at range 1, you must roll 1 additional die. After the attack hits, suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

name: DIS-T81
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token from a friendly ship in the enemy ship's firing arc to change 1 [Focus] result to an [Evade] or [Hit] result.

name: DIS-T81
description: While you defend or perform an attack, you may reroll any number of your dice. Then if you were defending, gain 1 strain token for each die that was rerolled. If you were attacking, gain 1 deplete token for each die that was rerolled instead.

name: General Grievous
description: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not in the defender's firing arc, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

name: IG-101
description: At the start of the System Phase, you may repair 1 faceup damage card.

name: IG-102
description: While you defend, if the attacker's initiative is equal to or greater than yours, you may change 1 blank result to a [Focus] result.

name: MagnaGuard Protector
description: After placing forces, assign the Guarded condition to 1 friendly ship other than MagnaGuard Protector.

name: Berwer Kret
description: After you perform an attack that hits, each friendly ship with [Calculate] on its action bar and a lock on the defender may perform a red [Calculate] action.

name: Durge
description: When you would be destroyed, you may spend 1 [Charge] to reveal all of your facedown damage cards. If you do, discard each Direct Hit! and each of your damage cards with the Pilot trait, then repair all of your faceup damage cards.

name: Phlac-Arphocc Prototype
description: During the System Phase, you may spend your lock on a ship to look at that ship's dial.

name: Phlac-Arphocc Prototype
description: At the start of the Engagement Phase, if there is an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc], gain a calculate token

name: Volan Das
description: After you fully execute a red maneuver, you may chose an enemy ship at range 1. The chosen ship gains 1 strain token and you may remove 1 stress token.

name: Zam Wesell
description: Setup: Lose 2 [Charge]. During the System Phase, you may assign 1 of your secret conditions to yourself facedown: “You Should Thank Me” or “You'd Better Mean Business”

name: Jango Fett
description: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the difficulty of your revealed maneuver is less than that of the enemy ship's, you may change 1 of the enemy ship's [Focus] results to a blank result.

name: Sun Fac
description: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is tractored, roll 1 additional attack die.
